list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a fastening made by tying a piece of string, rope, or something similar.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: tie a knot at the end of the cord
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: buộc một nút ở cuối dây

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a tangled mass in something such as hair.
a knob, protuberance, or node in a stem, branch, or root.
an unpleasant feeling of tightness or tension in a part of the body.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her stomach was in knots as she unlocked the door
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Dạ dày của cô là trong các nút thắt khi cô mở khóa cửa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small tightly packed group of people.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the little knot of people clustered around the doorway
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Knot nhỏ của những người tụ tập quanh ngưỡng cửa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a unit of speed equivalent to one nautical mile per hour, used especially of ships, aircraft, or winds.
a small, relatively short-billed sandpiper, with a reddish-brown or blackish breast in the breeding season.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the scarves were knotted loosely around their throats
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những chiếc khăn bị thắt nút lỏng lẻo xung quanh cổ họng của họ

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the shampoo knotted my hair terribly
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Dầu gội thắt tóc của tôi khủng khiếp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cause (a muscle) to become tense and hard.
